decks.notes: The deck revolves around utilizing a combination of countermagic, removal spells, and card advantage to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy. It also includes ramp spells to accelerate into powerful threats like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath, and utilizes cards like Mystic Sanctuary and LÃ³rien Revealed to generate additional value. The deck aims to stall the game and outvalue the opponent, eventually establishing dominance and closing out the game efficiently. It also includes various hate cards like Leyline Binding to further disrupt the opponent's game plan.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying threats and disrupting the opponent's game plan through aggressive gameplay and countermagic. It utilizes efficient creatures like Delver of Secrets and Dragon's Rage Channeler, along with disruptive spells like Force of Will and Daze to control the pace of the game. The main strategy is to apply early pressure while keeping the opponent off balance with counterspells and land destruction. This deck aims to close out games before the opponent can establish a strong board presence or answer the aggressive threats.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while applying pressure with efficient creatures and equipment. It aims to control the board with cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Skyclave Apparition, while also having removal and protection spells like Swords to Plowshares and Mother of Runes. The deck also utilizes Aether Vial to cheat creatures into play and outvalue the opponent. With a mix of disruptive elements and aggressive threats, the deck looks to outpace the opponent and disrupt their strategy to secure victory.

The deck revolves around using Show and Tell to put powerful creatures or artifacts into play for free. By utilizing cards like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, along with powerful artifacts like The One Ring and Otawara, Soaring City, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly and efficiently. Cards like Hullbreacher and Force of Will provide protection and disruption, while cards like Omniscience and Intuition provide card advantage and flexibility. With a strong mana base and powerful combo pieces, the deck can quickly overpower opponents and win the game.

This deck focuses on controlling the opponent's actions through counterspells and removal spells while also utilizing card advantage engines like Narset, Parter of Veils and Teferi, Time Raveler. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan and stall the game until it can establish a dominant board position with powerful threats like Murktide Regent. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure access to a variety of colors for maximum flexibility in casting spells. Ultimately, the goal is to outvalue the opponent and secure victory through efficient control of the game.

The primary focus of this deck is to control the game by utilizing Stifle effects to disrupt opponents' strategies, while also utilizing cards like Dress Down and Swords to Plowshares to handle threats. The centerpiece of the deck is Phyrexian Dreadnought, a powerful threat that can be cheated into play with its drawback negated. The deck also includes card draw and filtering effects to help smooth out draws and find key pieces. Overall, the deck aims to establish control of the game and win through an overwhelming threat like Phyrexian Dreadnought.

This deck aims to quickly ramp up mana and drop powerful threats like Goblin Engineer and Walking Ballista to control the board and deal damage to the opponent. It also utilizes artifacts like Ensnaring Bridge and Shadowspear for added disruption and protection. The inclusion of Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provide alternative win conditions and synergies with the deck's artifact theme. With a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive elements, this Dragon Stompy deck is designed to overwhelm opponents and secure victory through strategic use of its key cards.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while applying pressure through aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. It utilizes cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Spirit of the Labyrinth to slow down the opponent, while deploying threats like Mirran Crusader and Skyclave Apparition to control the board. The deck also has strong synergy with equipment like Batterskull and Umezawa's Jitte, allowing for additional versatility and power. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's plans while steadily building up its own board presence to secure victory.

This deck focuses on using artifacts to disrupt opponents and create a fast-paced aggressive strategy. Cards like Thorn of Amethyst and Lodestone Golem slow down opponents, while Mox Opal and Lotus Petal provide quick mana acceleration. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Patchwork Automaton offer strong creatures to pressure opponents. The deck also includes disruptive artifacts like Tormod's Crypt and Soul-Guide Lantern to disrupt opposing strategies. The goal is to overwhelm opponents quickly with a combination of disruptive artifacts and aggressive creatures.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Brainstorm, then bring them back onto the battlefield using spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead. This combo strategy aims to overwhelm the opponent with big creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. The deck also includes disruption cards like Daze and Force of Will to protect the combo and control the opponent's plays. The mana base includes fetch lands and dual lands to ensure consistent mana production.
